title: Quick Draw
resume:
Quick Draw is a comedy television series created by Nancy Hower and John Lehr for Hulu. Lehr stars and Hower directs this entirely improvised half hour comedy. The show follows Harvard graduate John Henry Hoyle who becomes the sheriff of Great Bend, Kansas in 1875.
The show marks Hulu's third foray into original scripted programming. It premiered online on August 5, 2013.
